title: (x) M & T Bank logo - ITC Bookman {Lari}
content:
I work at an architecture firm who is working on something for M&T Bank Stadium. Anyone know what that font is so we can accurately represent it in other renderings?

[http://www.mandtbank.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005432/http:/www.mandtbank.com/ "http://www.mandtbank.com/")

Thanks.

Emily

 [‹ (x) Christiane Rochefort "Les petits enfants du siècle" book cover - Baskerville BQ {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005432/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30356 "Go to previous forum topic") [Topshop logo simple thin sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005432/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30334 "Go to next forum topic")
author: emilyhok
